extendedInfo.description: Call Beeper lets you make your calls more effective by helping to plan the time of your call.During the call, the application sends you an alarm by a pre-configured tasks.We have developed the most flexible and thought out configuration of notification.Killer feature: smart analyzer of the beginning of an outgoing call.Many operators round the time of the call, as well as cost is calculated differently depending on the duration of the call.With Call Beeper you can configure notifications about the current time and to plan the duration of your call. Also you can configure the call interruption - Auto Hang Up feature.For example, my operator rounds up the cost of a call to minutes.If the time of my talk will be about 5 seconds, 25 or 55, I still pay the same price.I set up Call Beeper to the notice within 50 seconds after the start of a call with repeats every two minutes.Now for 10 seconds before beginning of a new minute I get a notice.And if I think it's time to end the conversation, I have a time to quietly say goodbye and hang up.Call Beeper has several predefined tasks to be notified every minute and at the beginning of the call. Now you do not have to worry about the duration of the call.Call Beeper is a free application, but we have paid special attention to design and ease of use.If you do not know whether you need an application, then just try it, it will complement your phone and you will definitely find it convenient.Moreover, it is totally free and you can always completely remove it.We are always open for communication. You can send all your comments and suggestions on the site www.callbeeper.com by a convenient form of voting.

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe it\'s so difficult to find a simple program to notify about call duration. Call Timer works horribly. Call Beeper deserves 1,000,000+ users.
reviews.author: Filip Filipovi\304\207

reviews.title: Superb app...
reviews.comment: It consumes some more ram. Make it less.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: unreliable
reviews.comment: On my phone it is completely unreliable, now it never beeps, or if it beeps it is always after the minute passed, weird that when I installed it worked flawlessly for a couple of weeks but then it stopped I could not figure out why. 5 stars for the first weeks, 0 at the time being. Sorry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply the best In-call beeper app..!!! :)
reviews.comment: Guys, this is simply the best ever in-call beeper app.. it allows you to modify each and every aspect of in-call intimation. And the most important aspect of this app is that, it is very very easy to use. The UI is best. Even a child can understand and use this app..!! So, now simply keep calling without worrying about your airtime..and dont allow your operator to earn for the time that you dont use your airtime..!! This will be a big hit in India.. :) Hearty thanks to the developer for making this wonderful app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but the best!
reviews.comment: I was looking for this kind of applications. I tried every applications of this kind.  Just when i was about to give up i found this Gold! Thanks!  Keep it up!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is first app that do exactly what everybody who have one minute rounding need. Exilent job. Thanks!
